name: Top 50 U.S. baccalaureate-origin institutions of American Indian or Alaska Native doctorate recipients from 2010–20, by institutional control, 2018 Carnegie classification, and HAIANE status
description: Top 50 U.S. baccalaureate-origin institutions of American Indian or Alaska Native doctorate recipients from 2010–20, by institutional control, 2018 Carnegie classification, and HAIANE status

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Includes only U.S. citizens and permanent residents. Institutions with the same number of doctorate recipients are listed alphabetically. R1: doctoral universities are those with very high research activity. R2: doctoral universities are institutions with high research activity.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Earned Doctorates.
